LanguageData.SmokeleafAddiction.label: dependencia a la hierba de fumar
LanguageData.SmokeleafAddiction.description: A chemical addiction to smokeleaf. Long-term use of smokeleaf has caused neurological adaptations at the cellular level, so the brain can no longer function properly without the drug.\n\nWithout regular doses of smokeleaf, withdrawal symptoms will begin. However, extended abstinence will force the brain to adapt back to its normal state, resolving the addiction.
LanguageData.SmokeleafHigh.label: puesto con hierba de fumar
LanguageData.SmokeleafHigh.description: Smokeleaf's active chemical in the bloodstream. Generates a soft feeling of fuzzy well-being.
LanguageData.SmokeleafTolerance.label: tolerancia a la hierba de fumar
LanguageData.SmokeleafTolerance.description: A built-up tolerance to smokeleaf. The more severe this tolerance is, the more smokeleaf it takes to get the same effect.
LanguageData.SmokeleafTolerance.stages.small-0.label: mínima
LanguageData.SmokeleafTolerance.stages.small-1.label: ligera
LanguageData.SmokeleafTolerance.stages.large.label: grande
LanguageData.SmokeleafTolerance.stages.massive.label: altísima
